name: Islog Github Page
body:
### Welcome to Islog Github pages.

This is the organization pages for [Islog](http://www.islog.com). We are a company specialized in RFID technology.

### Our main open source projects

* [LibLogicalAccess](http://islog.github.io/liblogicalaccess) is a rather complete RFID library supporting a wide range of devices and cards. The library is stable and used in production.
* [Leosac](http://islog.github.io/leosac) is an open source physical access control system designed to work on embedded hardware (Raspberry Pi). This project is under development and is not yet ready for use in production system.

#### And also...

* [Tempos](http://islog.github.io/tempos) which is a complete management system for rooms and bookings which can be coupled to a physical access control.
* [DokanNFC](https://github.com/islog/dokan-nfc) is as [Dokan](http://dokan-dev.github.io) plugin that let the user mount an RFID card as a Windows filesystem. This project is under development.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
